Package ohos.agp.render

Class Arc

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Arc

  • public class Arc
extends Object
    Describes parameters for drawing an arc.

    The parameters for drawing an arc include the start angle, sweep angle, and whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.

    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Detail

      • Arc

        public Arc​()
        Default constructor used to create an Arc instance.

      • Arc

        public Arc​(float startAngle,
           float sweepAngle,
           boolean useCenter)
        Parameterized constructor used to create an Arc instance.

        The startAngle, sweepAngle, and useCenter parameters can be specified.

        Parameters:
        startAngle - Indicates the start angle of the arc, which zero degree is at three o'clock.
        sweepAngle - Indicates the sweep angle of the arc, which is clockwise rotation.
        useCenter - Indicates whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.

    • Method Detail

      • setArc

        public void setArc​(float startAngle,
                   float sweepAngle,
                   boolean useCenter)
        Changes the parameters of an arc.

        The startAngle, sweepAngle, and useCenter parameters can be specified.

        Parameters:
        startAngle - Indicates the start angle of the arc.
        sweepAngle - Indicates the sweep angle of the arc.
        useCenter - Indicates whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.

      • getSweepAngle

        public float getSweepAngle​()
        Obtains the sweep angle of an arc.
        Returns:
        Returns the sweep angle of the arc.

      • getStartAngle

        public float getStartAngle​()
        Obtains the start angle of an arc.
        Returns:
        Returns the start angle of the arc.

      • getUseCenter

        public boolean getUseCenter​()
        Obtains the value of the useCenter attribute, which indicates whether to draw the lines from both end points of the arc to its center.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the lines are drawn; returns false otherwise.
